title: Inflated Polls and Ballot Paper Shortages? with Congressman Andy Biggs
itunes:title: Inflated Polls and Ballot Paper Shortages? with Congressman Andy Biggs
description:
With only 12 days left, Charlie unpacks the control the Left is taking over the Election Day narrative, starting right in his own backyard— Phoenix, Arizona. According to ABC News the newest concern? Paper shortages from supply chain issues, and it could have drastic consequences if conservatives don’t make a plan to vote. He’s also joined by Congressman Andy Biggs to discuss a smear tactics from his opponent—who happens to be smearing Turning Point at the same time.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
